description: China's glaciers have shrunk by 26 percent over six decades, with nearly 7,000 small glaciers disappearing. Data from the Chinese Academy of Sciences reveals that glacier area dropped from 59,000 sq km in the 1960s to 46,000 sq km by 2020. Scientists warn that continued ice loss could worsen water shortages. Authorities are trying to slow the process using artificial snow systems, but climate change remains a major driver of glacier retreat.
title: China Loses 26 Percent of Its Glaciers Due to Global Warming, Claims New Study

description: Over the past 20 years, Greenland’s glaciers have melted enough to expose 1,620 kilometres of new coastline, altering the Arctic’s geography. Satellite data from 2000 to 2020 tracked these changes, showing significant ice loss. The study also identified 35 newly exposed islands, some of which remain unclaimed on existing maps. Scientists warn of environmental consequences as glacial retreat accelerates, impacting sea levels and ecosystems. The discovery of new land could also lead to geopolitical interest in the region’s untapped resources.
title: Greenland’s Melting Glaciers Expose 1,620 km of New Coastline Since 2000

description: A major difference in the decay of matter and antimatter has been observed in beauty-lambda baryons, according to new research from the LHCb experiment at CERN. The discovery provides insight into why the universe contains more matter than antimatter. Scientists found that the chance of this decay difference occurring randomly is less than one in three million. While the findings do not fully explain the imbalance, experts believe they add a crucial piece to the puzzle of one of physics' biggest mysteries.
title: Scientists Spot a Key Difference in Matter and Antimatter Decay

description: T Corona Borealis, a binary star system in the Northern Crown constellation, is showing signs of an imminent nova eruption. The white dwarf star, which pulls material from its red giant companion, last erupted in 1946. Astronomers have detected patterns similar to previous eruptions, leading to predictions of a possible outburst within the next two years. If it erupts, the nova could reach a magnitude of +2, making it briefly visible to the naked eye. Scientists are also monitoring its long-term fate, as exceeding the Chandrasekhar limit could result in a Type Ia supernova.
title: T Corona Borealis May Erupt Soon: Rare Nova Could Be Visible to Naked Eye

description: Amazon introduced an artificial intelligence (AI) agent on Monday that can perform various browser-based tasks. Dubbed the Amazon Nova Act, the AI agent is powered by the tech giant’s foundation Nova family of AI models. These are first-party models the company claims will offer “frontier intelligence and industry leading price performance.”
title: Amazon Introduces Nova Act AI Agent as Research Preview, Expands Access to Its Frontier AI Models

description: Asus has teased its next-gen ROG Ally handheld console, promising hardware upgrades. First announced in 2023, the ROG Ally saw a mid-cycle refresh last year, and the next gen version is expected to arrive later this year. Reports suggest Asus is also developing an Xbox-branded handheld, blending Windows and Xbox experiences with a console-inspired UI.
title: Asus Teases Next-Gen ROG Ally Model That Could Arrive as a Portable Xbox Handheld

description: The US, under President Donald Trump, is making strides in creating a nurturing environment for the crypto sector to grow. In a fresh development, the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) has announced that financial institutions under its oversight no longer need prior approval to dabble in crypto-related activities. The CFTC, on the other hand, stated that crypto derivatives will be regulated the same way other derivative products are regulated in the US.
title: US CFTC, FDIC Revoke Crypto-Related Restrictions for Banks: All Details

description: Amazfit Bip 6 was launched in the US on Monday. The smartwatch comes with a 1.97-inch AMOLED screen, Bluetooth calling, and health monitoring features like heart rate, sleep, blood-oxygen and stress trackers. The smart wearable also supports GPS tracking with offline, downloadable maps. The Amazfit Bip 6 is said to offer a battery life of up to 14 days with regular use and up to 26 days in battery-saving mode.
title: Amazfit Bip 6 With 1.97-Inch AMOLED Display, Up to 14 Day Battery Life Launched: Price, Features

description: BenQ W2720i AI home cinema projector was launched in India on Tuesday. It comes with support for streaming content in 4K UHD using a 4 LED (RGBB) lamp with a lifetime of up to 30,000 hours. The BenQ W2720i runs on Android TV OS, offering support for streaming services such as Disney+ and Netflix.
title: BenQ W2720i AI Home Cinema Projector With 4K HDR Output and Android TV OS Launched in India

description: Microsoft is finally expanding some of the missing artificial intelligence (AI) features to the Intel and AMD-powered Copilot+ PCs. Announced on Monday, the Redmond-based tech giant is now making AI features in Windows 11, such as Live Captions, Cocreator, Restyle Image and Image Creator, available to select Intel and AMD chipsets.
title: Microsoft Is Expanding Snapdragon-Exclusive AI Features to Intel, AMD-Powered Copilot+ PCs

description: Monster Hunter Wilds has sold 10 million copies across platforms, Capcom announced Monday. The action-RPG achieved the sales milestone in a month after it launched on February 28. The game has now also set the first-month sales record for Capcom, the company said.
title: Monster Hunter Wilds Sells 10 Million Copies, Sets Capcom's First-Month Sales Record

description: Realme has announced the launch date of the Realme Narzo 80 Pro 5G and Realme Narzo 80x 5G smartphones in India. Both handsets will run on MediaTek Dimensity chipsets and will go on sale via Amazon. The brand has teased their price ranges as well. The Realme Narzo 80 Pro 5G and Realme Narzo 80x 5G will arrive as the successors to last year's Narzo 70 Pro and Narzo 70x, respectively.
title: Realme Narzo 80 Pro 5G, Narzo 80x 5G India Launch Date Set for April 9; Specifications, Price Range Teased

description: Vivo X200s will launch in China alongside the Vivo X200 Ultra variant. The company has teased the April launch of the handsets and revealed the Vivo X200s in two colour options. Alongside the smartphones, the brand will unveil two new tablets, namely the Vivo Pad 5 Pro and Vivo Pad SE, as well as the Vivo Watch 5. Vivo has also teased the design of the tablets and the smartwatch.
title: Vivo X200s Design Officially Teased; to Launch in April Alongside Vivo X200 Ultra, Pad 5 Pro, Pad SE, Watch 5

description: Alcatel is all set to make a comeback in the Indian market. The French brand, operated independently by TCL Communication under trademark licensing from Nokia, has been inactive in the Indian smartphone arena for the last couple of years. It is confirmed to release a range of new premium smartphones in the country. These devices will be manufactured locally in India. Apart from production, the brand is eyeing to build a nationwide service network to ensure customer support.
title: Alcatel to Launch Premium Smartphone Range in India; Will Focus on Local Manufacturing

description: Apple Watch Series 10 arrived last year with the first wide-angle OLED screen but didn't include new health sensors. Leaked images of an Apple Watch Series 10 prototype reveal a unique sensor absent in older models. Reports suggest Apple is developing advanced sensors for future models, which could enable blood glucose and blood pressure monitoring.
title: Apple Watch Series 10 Prototype Leak Reveals Unidentified Health Sensor

description: Ghost of Yotei was revealed with a trailer at a PlayStation State of Play broadcast in September 2024. While Sony has since not shared an update on the first-party title, new information about the game’s story has surfaced on the PlayStation website.
title: Ghost of Yotei Official Website Reveals New Story Details, Reiterates 2025 Launch

description: Apple is said to be developing a new iPad Pro model and it is said to be in the “late testing” stage within the company. According to claims by a seasoned journalist, it will be one of the first devices to be powered by Apple’s upcoming M5 chipset. Four variants of the purported M5-powered iPad Pro are reported to be on track for production and it may commence in the second half of this year.
title: Apple Reportedly Developing M5-Powered iPad Pro; Production Slated to Begin in H2 2025

description: Japan's financial regulators are reportedly revising the Financial Instruments and Exchange Act to include crypto assets, aiming to submit the reformed bill to parliament by 2026 after completing their analysis. Led by the Financial Services Agency (FSA), this initiative aims to foster crypto industry growth under stringent regulatory oversight.
title: Crypto Assets May Gain Legal Status in Japan as Regulators Aim to Tackle Insider Trading: Report

description: Haier M80F series mini LED 4K smart TVs have been launched in India. The lineup includes models with 55-inch, 65-inch, 75-inch and 85-inch display size options. The series supports HDR10 and Dolby Vision IQ technology, said to offer an improved visual experience. It comes with an audio system backed by KEF, which is claimed to offer "cinema-quality sound."
title: Haier M80F Series Mini LED 4K Smart TVs Launched in India: Price, Features

description: Runway, the video-focused artificial intelligence (AI) firm, introduced a new video generation model on Monday. Dubbed Gen-4, it is an image-to-video generation model which succeeds the company’s Gen-3 Alpha AI model. It comes with several improvements, including consistency in characters, locations, and objects across scenes, as well as controllable real-world physics.
title: Runway Gen-4 AI Video Generation Model With Improved Character Consistency and Real-World Physics Released

description: Samsung is developing a 360-degree foldable phone, as revealed in a patent application. The device features a thin design with an inner screen that unfolds into a larger display or folds backward to serve as a cover display. Samsung showed off a phone with such a display in 2023, but it remains uncertain if this innovative foldable phone will be commercially launched.
title: Samsung Foldable With 360-Degree Inward and Outward Folding Support Spotted in Patent Application

description: iOS 19 will bring a visual overhaul to the iPhone with more consistency for controls, icons, buttons, according to claims by a seasoned journalist. The journalist claims that Apple’s next generation operating system (OS) will minimise the visual differences across devices such as the iPhone, iPad, Mac, and the Apple Vision Pro and deliver a more unified experience.
title: iOS 19 to Bring ‘Glassy’ Effects, Consistent User Interface Dynamics to iPhone: Mark Gurman

description: OnePlus is preparing to bring the OnePlus 13T to the market soon. The Chinese electronic brand has shared a teaser on the social media platform to offer hints about the arrival of the new OnePlus 13T in its home country. It is expected to feature a compact form factor. The OnePlus 13T is tipped to come with a 6.3-inch display, a 6,200mAh battery, and the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset.
title: OnePlus 13T With Compact Form Factor Officially Teased to Launch Soon: Expected Specifications

description: OpenAI expanded its image-generation feature powered by the GPT-4o model to all users on Tuesday. The artificial intelligence (AI) image generation capability was first rolled out to the paid subscribers of ChatGPT last month, and now even those on the free tier can access it. However, the free users will get limited usage with a high rate limit added.
title: OpenAI Expands GPT-4o-Powered Image Generation Feature in ChatGPT to All Users

description: Redmi A5 has been unveiled in Indonesia with an octa-core Unisoc T7250 chipset and a 5,200mAh battery. It runs on Android 15 Go Edition out-of-the-box and has a 3.5mm audio jack. The smartphone is equipped with a 32-megapixel dual rear camera setup and an 8-megapixel selfie shooter. It comes with a 6.88-inch display with triple TÜV Rheinland eye-protection certifications.
title: Redmi A5 With Unisoc T7250 SoC, 5,200mAh Battery Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Samsung's AI-powered refrigerator lineup features a 9-inch home screen that allows users to simply say, “Hi Bixby, find my phone,” and the enhanced assistant, capable of recognizing the voice of individual family members, will ring the correct device.
title: Samsung’s AI Fridges Can Find Misplaced Phones, Adjust Air Conditioners

description: French antitrust regulators levied a fine of EUR 150 million ($162.4 million or roughly Rs. 1,389 crore) on Apple this week. The head of the French Competition Authority dismissed worries that the decision would prompt retaliation from U.S. President Donald Trump who has threatened to slap fines on EU countries fining US companies.
title: Apple Hit With $162 Million French Antitrust Fine Over Privacy Tool

description: Apple is reportedly working on revamping the Health app and plans to add an artificial intelligence (AI) doctor. As per the report, the Cupertino-based tech giant is planning to offer users a personalised experience with its app, complete with ecosystem-wide and third-party data tracking and health recommendations based on shared information.
title: Apple Planning to Upgrade Its Health App, Add an AI-Powered Doctor for Recommendations: Mark Gurman

description: Foxconn reportedly plans to increase iPhone production in India, aiming for up to 30 million units in 2025, after assembling 12 million smartphones in 2024. Apple is said to be aiming to diversify its supply chain, with reports indicating that AirPods, iPad, and MacBook models might also be produced in the country.
title: Apple Supplier Foxconn Reportedly Plans to Double iPhone Production in India This Year

description: The overall valuation of the crypto sector surged by 1.37 percent over the last 24 hours. Bitcoin and Ether showed small gains on Tuesday, April 1. Ripple, Solana, and Shiba Inu also managed to register price hikes over the weekend. Binance Coin and Stellar, meanwhile, logged losses on the price charts.
title: Crypto Price Today: Bitcoin, Ether See Small Gains, Most Altcoins Reflect Profits

description: Elon Musk's xAI has acquired X in a deal that values the social media platform at $33 billion (roughly Rs. 2,82,447 crore). Much of the deal's specifics remain unclear, such as how X's leaders would be integrated in the new firm or whether there would be regulatory scrutiny.
title: Elon Musk's Social Media Firm X Bought by His AI Company, Valued at $33 Billion

description: Intel will spin off assets that aren’t central to its mission and create new products. The company needs to replace the engineering talent it has lost, improve its balance sheet and better attune manufacturing processes to meet the needs of potential customers, Tan said.
title: Intel CEO Lip-Bu Tan Says Company Will Spin Off Non-Core Units

description: Poco C71 will launch in India later this week, the company has confirmed. It also revealed the design, colour options and key features of the upcoming handset including display, build, battery, camera and processor details. Meanwhile, promotional images have hinted at the price range of the smartphone as well.
title: Poco C71 India Launch Set for April 4; Design, Price Range, Key Features Revealed

description: Qualcomm has announced that it will launch a new Snapdragon chipset in China on April 2. While the US-based chipmaker did not reveal details, it is speculated to be the successor to the Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 which might come with the moniker Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 or Snapdragon 8s Elite.
title: Qualcomm Schedules New Chipset Launch in China on April 2; May Announce Snapdragon 8s Gen 4

description: In the absence of marketing for GTA 6 ahead of launch, Rockstar parent Take-Two Interactive has now explained the secrecy around the game, saying it wants to maintain “anticipation and excitement” for the release.
title: Rockstar Not Revealing GTA 6 Release Date to Maintain 'Anticipation and Excitement', Says Take-Two CEO

description: After unveiling the design of its upcoming slim and premium S-series device called the Galaxy S25 Edge at its last Unpacked event, a tipster now claims that the device will be launched as soon as this month. However, it remains unclear whether it will be a global launch or only applies to specific markets. Samsung has yet to reveal any official hardware specifications of the device.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Tipped to Launch in April in Vietnam

description: Vivo V50e will be launched soon in India. While the Chinese smartphone brand has not revealed the exact launch date of the new V series smartphone, it has shared multiple teasers confirming its colour options and key specifications. The Vivo V50e will feature a quad-curved display with 120Hz refresh rate. It is confirmed to house a 50-megapixel selfie shooter and include multiple AI features like Circle to Search.
title: Vivo V50e Teased to Launch in India Soon; Colour Options, Key Specifications Confirmed

description: Dolby Cinema is launching in India, bringing enhanced visuals with Dolby Vision and immersive audio via Dolby Atmos to select theatres soon. Viewers can enjoy a premium in-theatre experience with superior picture and sound quality for an additional cost. Earlier this year, Dolby unveiled its first certified post-production facility in Hyderabad.
title: Dolby Laboratories to Launch Dolby Cinema in Six Indian Cities in 2025

description: Google's Pixel 10 series launch is expected to take place in August, but there's already a lot of buzz surrounding the Pixel 9 successors. Most recently, the first set of renders purportedly depicting the upcoming Pixel 10 Pro Fold have leaked online. The foldable device appears to have a similar design as its predecessor.
title: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold Early Renders Leaked; Suggest Minimal Design Changes From Pixel 9 Pro Fold

description: Apple released the visionOS 2.4 update for the Apple Vision Pro on Monday. It is considered a major update and introduces the first set of Apple Intelligence features for the mixed reality (MR) headset. Users can now leverage Writing Tools for summarising and editing text, Image Playground for reimagining photos, and natural language search in Photos to find the best memories quickly
title: Apple Vision Pro Gets Apple Intelligence Capabilities and New Features With visionOS 2.4 Update

description: Apple on Monday released its highly anticipated iOS 18.4 update for iPhone. It adds to the list of Apple Intelligence features including Priority Notifications and the availability of Visual Intelligence on the iPhone 15 Pro modelsThe Cupertino-based technology giant also expands its AI suite to include India and other regions.
title: iOS 18.4 With Visual Intelligence for iPhone 15 Pro Rolling Out; Brings Apple Intelligence to India

description: Vivo Y300 Pro+ was launched in China on Monday. The phone is equipped with a 7,300mAh battery with support for 90W fast charging and a Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 chipset paired with up to 12GB RAM. The handset is accompanied by a Vivo Y300t model, which comes with a 6,500mAh battery with 44W fast charging support and a MediaTek Dimensity 7300 SoC.
title: Vivo Y300 Pro+ With 7,300mAh Battery, 90W Charging Launched Alongside Vivo Y300t
